blogs.title: That Microsoft deal isn’t exclusive, video is coming and more from OpenAI CEO Sam Altman
blogs.description: OpenAI co-founder and CEO Sam Altman sat down for a wide-ranging interview with this editor late last week, answering questions about some of his most ambitious personal investments, as well as about the future of OpenAI.
blogs.author: Connie Loizos
comments: I never found any stunning article like yours.

blogs.title: Mailchimp says it was hacked — again
blogs.description: Email marketing and newsletter giant Mailchimp says it was hacked and that dozens of customers’ data was exposed.
blogs.author: Zack Whittaker
comments: Oh my god, is this true

blogs.title: Shein valuation reportedly plummets by a third as it seeks $3B
blogs.description: Shein, the fast fashion behemoth that has swept across the world, is raising a significant down round as the startup world braces for a funding crunch.
blogs.author: Rita Liao
